about_the_game:
1. Introduction: Game content:

You wake up from a nightmare and find yourself trapped in a gorgeous room.

And you have lost the memories before coming here.

In front of you are two doll girls with vastly different personalities.

You become taskers carrying systems and need to shuttle through different inner worlds to complete tasks.

The inner world is the nightmare of humanity and the demon of humanity.



Only one of the three of you can live to the end



2. Introduction to game features

Original artwork tailored to each character's personality; unique painting style that makes every scene unique.

The plot revolves around survival puzzle solving and SRPG battle chess gameplay, providing you with a new experience. The small gameplay in the work is full of wit, and the colorful stories are vivid and vivid.

Is it true or false? Is it obedience or combat? Should we shoulder the responsibility of this world and start from here“



3. Game gameplay

SRPG game chess, infinite flow plot, dual line light and dark, the main control perspective may not know the truth, everything in the dungeon is a hint

name: 人偶工坊

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windowsXP,Vista,7,8,10
  • Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windowsXP,Vista,7,8,10
  • Processor: 2Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
